thread.section_title: Hotel Vernet - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: March in Paris with my brother!
thread.title_full: March in Paris with my brother! - Review of Hotel Vernet, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Angela C
title: March in Paris with my brother!
text: This hotel is beautiful! The staff were extremely polite and accommodating! The rooms are sweet, modern, clean. Had a balcony view, just beautiful! Great location and Quaint. They called us to see if we needy reservations anywhere, they were right there to open the doors, grab your bag, or hand you an umbrella - it was a bit wet that week lol. 5 stars!
